title: The Rochemer Hag
description: When lovely, penniless Sophie Sedgewick came to Rochemer Hall, she did not expect an easy life as governess to two children. Nor did she think she would be less than lonely in the dark, windy isolation of the north-country estate. But she was not prepared for the icy terror that struck that first night in the ancient manor. Or for the rumors about Master Edmund's demented, long-dead wife.When Sophie knew she must leave Rochemer Hall to save herself, it was, suddenly, too late. The iron gates of the mansion were closing like the doors of a huge trap. And death was in the air...
author: Louise W. King
